title: US$ 6.5 mn paid for two gas shipments
body_lines: LITRO Gas Lanka Ltd. has paid US$ 6.5 million today for the next two shipment of LP gas, LITRO officials said.
LITRO Chairman, Vijitha Herath stated that payment for 7,500 MT of gas has been made, and the first 3,500 MT cargo is scheduled to reach Colombo on Thursday. (Chaturanga Samarawickrama)
